TopicTitle: Camera's that can attach to rovers for realism

Articles.Content: I had Kerbal Space Program for about 3 months and it is great! But I think it would be more realistic if you had cameras that can be mounted to your probe or rocket. It would be completely optional.

There is a mod called Lazor Cam that does exactly this.

Although, it would be cool to have this in game.
and let the part count rocket up...besides that one oversight. great idea.
